DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety efficacy eletriptan treatment migraine subject adequately treat non-steroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs )
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Eletriptan Treatment Migraine Subjects Unsuccessfully Treated With Nonsteroidal Anti-inflammatory Drugs
DOC.criteria: Met International Headache Society diagnostic criterion migraine without aura Expected suffer one six acute migraine attack per month base past history Experienced migraine least one year prior enter study , historically respond NSAIDs Frequent migraine frequent concomitant nonmigrainous headache ( average > 6 attack per month ) Atypical migraine consistently fail respond adequate medical therapy Migraine prolong aura , familial hemiplegic migraine , basilar migraine , migrainous infarction , migraine aura without headache , migraine acuteonset aura
